nodes.text: The S-X Vac-u-Bot was a sort of Labor Droid used in hangars and Docking Bays.

The Industrial Automaton S-X Vac-u-Bot was a big droid with wheels used to extract excess fuel and coolant from ships. They were also suitable for keeping cabling and piping tidy so that fuel and energy could be carried through smoothly. Sometimes it happened that Scrubber droids and the S-X came into conflict when they walked each other to a new task.
In the Theed Hangar on Naboo, such S-X units were set up.
